meanings.definition: A drug used to treat certain types of cancer and autoimmune diseases.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed methotrexate to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: She takes methotrexate regularly to manage her autoimmune condition.
meanings.sent3: When the methotrexate kicked in, the cancer cells were in for a surprise!
meanings.sent4: Methotrexate acted like a warrior, battling the cancer cells with determination.
meanings.sent5: The methotrexate pill was like a superhero fighting off the evil cancer invaders.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication commonly prescribed for rheumatoid arthritis.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother relies on methotrexate to ease her rheumatoid arthritis symptoms.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often recommend methotrexate as a first-line treatment for rheumatoid arthritis.
meanings.sent3: The methotrexate bottle seemed to wink at her, promising relief from the joint pain.
meanings.sent4: Methotrexate was like a soothing balm for her aching joints.
meanings.sent5: The methotrexate tablets were her trusted companions in the battle against arthritis.

meanings.definition: A chemotherapy drug that works by interfering with the growth of cancer cells.
meanings.sent1: The oncologist explained how methotrexate targets and stops cancer cell growth.
meanings.sent2: Patients undergoing chemotherapy often receive methotrexate to combat cancer.
meanings.sent3: The cancer cells were no match for the cunning methotrexate.
meanings.sent4: Methotrexate was like a silent assassin, halting the cancer cells' progress.
meanings.sent5: The methotrexate infusion was a powerful weapon against the relentless cancer cells.
